questions.question: You have a coconut and a friend give you another coconut - now you have 2 coconuts.
A drop of water is added to another drop of water - now there are 2 drops of water.
A square drawn on a piece of paper is 2D.
There exists a piece of paper so thin that it has no height.
The angles of a triangle add up to 180°.
The angles of a triangle drawn on a volleyball must add up to 180°.
Our moon's circumference is exactly pi times its diameter.
A moon next to a black hole has a circumference pi times its diameter.
You have 6 apples and give 3 to your friend. The 2 piles are equal.
You weigh the piles and find one is heavier, so you redistribute the apples by unit and weight. The 2 piles are now equal.
You measure the surface area for each piles and find one is pile has a greater surface area, so you redistribute the apples by unit, weight, and surface area. The 2 piles are now equal.
It is possible to divide the apples in 'half' without first defining a system of measurement.
There are some universal truths which exist independently of human-made systems.
